home.title: Discord Leveling Bot
home.description: Track chat and voice activity, reward your community!
home.chatLevelingDesc: Earn XP through active participation in text channels
home.voiceActivityDesc: Get rewarded for spending time in voice channels
home.roleRewardsDesc: Automatically assign roles based on member levels
home.leaderboardsDesc: Compete with other members and track your progress
home.customSettingsDesc: Fully customize XP rates, rewards, and announcements
home.rankCardsDesc: Beautiful, customizable rank cards to show off your progress
home.topGuildsDesc: The most active communities using ActivityBot
home.totalXpInfo: Total XP combines all member activity from both text and voice channels

guildSettings.title: Server Settings
guildSettings.countFakeInvitesHelp: Count invites from accounts less than 30 days old
guildSettings.countLeftInvitesHelp: Count invites even if the user leaves the server
guildSettings.enableInviteWelcomeHelp: Send welcome messages when users join via invites
guildSettings.inviteWelcomeChannelHelp: Channel where welcome messages are sent
guildSettings.resetInvitesDesc: Delete all invite tracking data for this server. This action cannot be undone!
guildSettings.dangerZoneWarning: Warning: These actions cannot be undone!
guildSettings.noXpChannelsHelp: Users won't earn XP in these channels
guildSettings.noXpRolesHelp: Users with these roles won't earn XP
guildSettings.resetUserLevelsDesc: Delete all user XP and levels. Settings, role rewards, and exclusions will remain unchanged.
guildSettings.resetEverythingDesc: Delete ALL bot data for this server and restore default settings. This includes levels, invites, and all configurations. This action cannot be undone!
guildSettings.messageCooldownHelp: Time between earning XP from messages
guildSettings.minVoiceXpHelp: Minimum XP earned per minute in voice chat
guildSettings.maxVoiceXpHelp: Maximum XP earned per minute in voice chat
guildSettings.minVoiceMinutesHelp: Minimum minutes in voice chat to earn XP
guildSettings.maxVoiceMinutesHelp: Maximum minutes counted for voice XP
guildSettings.voiceCooldownHelp: Time between earning XP from voice chat
guildSettings.xpMultiplierHelp: Global XP multiplier for all earnings
guildSettings.enableAnnouncementsHelp: Send messages when users level up
guildSettings.announcementChannelHelp: Channel where level-up messages are sent
